My experience in Gem hospital was really wonderful from day 1 when I entered for Gall bladder surgery.Discussing the details of the problem and the further course of action to be taken with Dr Palanivel Senthilnathan itself was a pleasant experience and he explained all the details very patiently and upto our satisfaction. His smiling. face was an inspiration and encourages me to proceed with the surgery. Ofcourse, the surgery was done neatly and I am recovering fast. Throughout my stay in the hospital, the services of the staff while taking the necessary blood tests and other investigative tests were simply best. The visits by doctors post surgery explaining all my queries, the utmost care taken by all the nursing staff and other supporting staff was really great.The administrative staff including the insurance department were very helpful. The pleasant surprise was the visit of the Director, Mrs.Senthilnathan enquiring about the facilities and wishing for speedy recovery. A special mention to be made about Miss.Prathiba who has guided me right from the beginning till I was discharged for her valuable services.All the doctor's and other staff were very kind and were responsible and responsive.The ambience of the hospital and the cleanliness of the rooms and surroundings were excellent.In short, the Gem hospital is really a gem of a hospital.

We visited Gem Hospital, Perungudi by getting appointment with Dr. P. Senthilnathan through Ms.Prathipa personal secretary to Dr. P. Senthilnathan for my sister's hernia surgery. Ms.Prathipa had taken keen interest and got appointment with Dr. Senthilnathan immediately. She guided us in each and every procedure to the surgery enthusiastically. She appears calm and quiet but efficient. She diserves higher position to discharge her duties and responsibilities with high degree of confidence.Dr. Senthilnathan reviewed my sister's health report and responded positively with pleasant smile. He is empathetic and explained the surgery procedure in simple and human approach. Dr.Senthilnathan had done the surgery and briefed the details in nutshell which gave us great pleasure and enthusiasm. He visited my sister in the room daily and patiently reviewed her health status and had taken great care and attention towards her health.We felt smooth and calm atmosphere in the hospital. Treatment is excellent. Canteen food is homely.Facility and infrastructure of the hospital is in high standard.The doctors and staff had taken treatment seamlessly . Fee is normal and affordable. The hospital maintenance is neat and tidy.On the whole you can visit and trust Gem hospital for your better health care and well being .
